title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: members, contributors, leaders pledge make participation community harassment-free experience everyone, regardless age, body size, visible invisible disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity expression, level experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, caste, color, religion, sexual identity orientation. pledge act interact ways contribute open, welcoming, diverse, inclusive, healthy community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Examples behavior contributes positive environment community include: Demonstrating empathy kindness toward people respectful differing opinions, viewpoints, experiences Giving gracefully accepting constructive feedback Accepting responsibility apologizing affected mistakes, learning experience Focusing best just us individuals, overall community Examples unacceptable behavior include: use sexualized language imagery, sexual attention advances kind Trolling, insulting derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others’ private information, physical email address, without explicit permission conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders responsible clarifying enforcing standards acceptable behavior take appropriate fair corrective action response behavior deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, harmful. Community leaders right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct, communicate reasons moderation decisions appropriate.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct applies within community spaces, also applies individual officially representing community public spaces. Examples representing community include using official e-mail address, posting via official social media account, acting appointed representative online offline event.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported community leaders responsible enforcement matthew.heun@.com. complaints reviewed investigated promptly fairly. community leaders obligated respect privacy security reporter incident.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders follow Community Impact Guidelines determining consequences action deem violation Code Conduct:

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Use inappropriate language behavior deemed unprofessional unwelcome community. Consequence: private, written warning community leaders, providing clarity around nature violation explanation behavior inappropriate. public apology may requested.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: violation single incident series actions. Consequence: warning consequences continued behavior. interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, specified period time. includes avoiding interactions community spaces well external channels like social media. Violating terms may lead temporary permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: serious violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior. Consequence: temporary ban sort interaction public communication community specified period time. public private interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, allowed period. Violating terms may lead permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Demonstrating pattern violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior, harassment individual, aggression toward disparagement classes individuals. Consequence: permanent ban sort public interaction within community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant, version 2.1, available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/version/2/1/code_of_conduct.html. Community Impact Guidelines inspired Mozilla’s code conduct enforcement ladder. answers common questions code conduct, see FAQ https://www.contributor-covenant.org/faq. Translations available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/translations.

title: Contributing to PFUSetup
text: document outlines propose change PFUSetup package.

title: Contributing to PFUSetup
text: can fix typos, spelling mistakes, grammatical errors documentation directly using GitHub web interface, long changes made source file. generally means ’ll need edit roxygen2 comments .R, .Rd file. can find .R file generates .Rd reading comment first line.

title: Contributing to PFUSetup
text: want make change bigger fixing typos, first file issue GitHub make sure someone team agrees proposed change needed. ’ve found bug, please file issue illustrates bug minimal reprex.

title: Contributing to PFUSetup
text: Fork package clone onto computer. Install development dependencies devtools::install_dev_deps(), make sure package passes R CMD check running devtools::check(). R CMD check doesn’t pass cleanly, ’s good idea ask help continuing. Create Git branch pull request (PR). recommend using usethis::pr_init("brief-description--change"). Make changes, commit git, create PR running usethis::pr_push(). Follow prompts browser. title PR briefly describe change. body PR contain Fixes #issue-number. user-facing changes, add bullet top NEWS.md (.e., beneath “always resolves latest release.”).

title: Contributing to PFUSetup
text: New code written style matches rest code PFUSetup. use roxygen2, Markdown syntax, documentation.

title: Contributing to PFUSetup

what: Get absolute paths to important files and folders appropriate for this computer — get_abs_paths
title: Get absolute paths to important files and folders appropriate for this computer — get_abs_paths
text: Default argument values assume directory structure includes Dropbox appropriate Fellowship project Dr. Paul Brockway.

title: Get absolute paths to important files and folders appropriate for this computer — get_abs_paths
code: get_abs_paths(   home_path = fs::path_home() %>% as.character(),   cloud_storage_path = "Dropbox",   project_path = file.path(cloud_storage_path, "Fellowship 1960-2015 PFU database"),   iea_year = "2022",   iea_folder_path = file.path(project_path, "IEA extended energy balance data",     paste("IEA", iea_year, "energy balance data")),   iea_data_path = file.path(iea_folder_path, paste("IEA Extended Energy Balances",     iea_year, "(TJ).csv")),   version = "v1.2",   input_data_path = file.path(project_path, "InputData", version),   output_data_path = file.path(project_path, "OutputData"),   fao_data_path = file.path(input_data_path, "fao_qcl_data.rds"),   ilo_employment_data_path = file.path(input_data_path, "ilo_employment_data.rds"),   ilo_working_hours_data_path = file.path(input_data_path, "ilo_working_hours_data.rds"),   hmw_analysis_data_path = file.path(input_data_path, "hmw_analysis_data.xlsx"),   amw_analysis_data_path = file.path(input_data_path, "amw_analysis_data.xlsx"),   mw_concordance_path = file.path(input_data_path, "FAO_ISO_MW_Mapping.xlsx"),   country_concordance_path = file.path(input_data_path, "Country_Concordance_Full.xlsx"),   aggregation_mapping_path = file.path(input_data_path, "aggregation_mapping.xlsx"),   phi_constants_path = file.path(input_data_path, "phi_constants.xlsx"),   exemplar_table_path = file.path(input_data_path, "Exemplar_Table.xlsx"),   fu_analysis_folder = file.path(input_data_path, "FU analysis data"),   machine_data_folder = file.path(input_data_path, "Machines - Data"),   ceda_data_folder = file.path(input_data_path, "CEDA Data"),   exiobase_energy_flows_path = file.path(input_data_path,     "exiobase_energy_flows_concordance.xlsx"),   reports_source_folders = "reports",   reports_dest_folder = file.path(output_data_path, "Reports"),   pipeline_caches_folder = file.path(output_data_path, "PipelineCaches"),   pipeline_releases_folder = file.path(output_data_path, "PipelineReleases"),   versions_and_products_path = file.path(pipeline_releases_folder,     "versions and products.xlsx"),   fsep = .Platform$file.sep )

title: Get absolute paths to important files and folders appropriate for this computer — get_abs_paths
text: home_path absolute path user's home directory. cloud_storage_path path user's cloud storage directory, relative home_path. project_path path project directory, relative home_path. iea_year year IEA data release, string. iea_folder_path path IEA data directory, relative home_path. iea_data_path path IEA data file, relative home_path. version version input data. input_data_path path input data directory, relative home_path. output_data_path path output data directory, relative home_path. fao_data_path path FAO live animals data file, relative home_path. ilo_employment_data_path path ILO employment data file, relative home_path. ilo_working_hours_data_path path ILO working hours data file, relative home_path. hmw_analysis_data_path path human muscle work analysis file, relative home_path. amw_analysis_data_path path animal muscle work file, relative home_path. mw_concordance_path path muscle work country concordance file, relative home_path. country_concordance_path path country concordance file, relative home_path. aggregation_mapping_path path aggregation mapping file, relative home_path. phi_constants_path path exergy--energy ratio file containing constant values, relative home_path. exemplar_table_path path exemplar table, relative home_path. fu_analysis_folder path folder containing final--useful exergy information, relative home_path. machine_data_folder path folder containing machine-specific efficiencies, relative home_path. ceda_data_folder path folder containing CEDA (Centre Environmental Data Analysis) data, relative home_path. exiobase_energy_flows_path path exiobase energy flows. reports_source_folders string vector paths folders containing report sources. reports_dest_folder path folder reports written, relative home_path. pipeline_caches_folder path folder containing zipped versions pipeline cache, relative home_path. Data stored .zip files Default "PipelineCaches" relative project_path. pipeline_releases_folder path folder containing released versions PSUT target data frame, relative home_path. Data stored using pins package. Default "PipelineReleases" relative project_path. versions_and_products_path path versions products file containing lists versions products, relative project_path. Default "versions_and_products.xlsx". fsep file separator used constructing paths. Default .Platform$file.sep.

title: Get absolute paths to important files and folders appropriate for this computer — get_abs_paths
text: named list containing paths important directories files, including: home_pathThe absolute path user's home. cloud_storage_pathThe absolute path user's cloud storage folder. project_pathThe absolute path project folder. iea_folder_pathThe absolute path folder containing IEA data. iea_data_pathThe absolute path IEA data file OECD countries. input_data_pathThe absolute path input data directory. output_data_pathThe absolute path output data directory. fao_data_pathThe absolute path FAO live animals data file. ilo_employment_data_pathThe absolute path ILO employment data file. ilo_working_hours_data_pathThe absolute path ILO working hours data file. hmw_analysis_data_pathThe absolute path human muscle work analysis file. amw_analysis_data_pathThe absolute path animal muscle work file. mw_concordance_pathThe absolute path muscle work country concordance file. country_concordance_pathThe absolute path country concordance file. aggregation_mapping_pathThe absolute path aggregation mapping file. phi_constants_pathThe absolute path exergy--energy ratio file containing constant values. exemplar_table_pathThe path exemplar table. fu_analysis_folderThe absolute path folder containing final--useful exergy information. machine_data_folderThe absolute path folder containing machine-specific efficiency information. ceda_data_folderThe absolute path folder containing CEDA environment information. exiobase_energy_flows_pathThe absolute path folder containing Exiobase energy flows information. reports_source_foldersA vector absolute paths folders containing source reports. reports_dest_folderA directory completed reports written. pipeline_caches_folderThe path folder stores zipped versions pipeline cache. pipeline_releases_folderThe path folder stores releases various targets. versions_and_products_pathThe path versions products file.

title: Get absolute paths to important files and folders appropriate for this computer — get_abs_paths
text: default argument home_path gets value fs::path_home(). Although function called get_abs_paths(), can return relative paths home_path cloud_storage_path set "" (empty string) project_path set root folder project. event, leading file separator (fsep) removed path (exists).

title: Get absolute paths to important files and folders appropriate for this computer — get_abs_paths

what: Get pin version strings for a CL-PFU database release — pin_versions
title: Get pin version strings for a CL-PFU database release — pin_versions
text: CL-PFU database uses pins package store results. function gives pin version strings CL-PFU database release.

title: Get pin version strings for a CL-PFU database release — pin_versions
code: pin_versions(   database_version,   versions_and_products_path = get_abs_paths()[["versions_and_products_path"]],   product_table_tab = "product_table",   product_column = "product",   pin_name_column = "pin_name" )

title: Get pin version strings for a CL-PFU database release — pin_versions
text: database_version string, prefixed "v" version interest. number prefixed "v" converted string internally. versions_and_products_path path "versions products.xlsx" file contains concordance table versions pin names. Default get_abs_paths()[["versions_and_products_path"]]. product_table_tab name version_table tab versions products file. Default "version_table". product_column name product column version table. Default "product". pin_name_column name pin name column version table. Default "pin_name".

title: Get pin version strings for a CL-PFU database release — pin_versions
text: named list pin version strings. Names various pin names product names. Values pin version strings.

title: Get pin version strings for a CL-PFU database release — pin_versions
text: return value named list values pin version strings name either product names pin version strings.

title: Get pin version strings for a CL-PFU database release — pin_versions
Pipe operator — %>%
text: See magrittr::%>% details.

title: PFUSetup 0.1.20 (2023-12-10)
text: Fixed bug examples running GitHub Actions. Still 77 tests, passing. Test coverage remains 100%.

title: PFUSetup 0.1.19 (2023-12-10)
text: Moved pkgdown website gh-pages branch. Still 77 tests, passing. Test coverage remains 100%.

title: PFUSetup 0.1.18 (2023-12-02)
text: Added code conduct contributing pages documentation. Still 77 tests, passing. Test coverage remains 100%.

title: PFUSetup 0.1.17 (2023-11-15)
text: Changed name tab versions products.xlsx file. Still 77 tests, passing. Test coverage remains 100%.

title: PFUSetup 0.1.16 (2023-11-11)
text: pin_versions() now moved package PFUPipelineTools. Paths Exiobase energy flows now added. Now 77 tests, passing. Test coverage remains 100%.

title: PFUSetup 0.1.15
text: Added new functions pin_versions() read_pin_version() assist development computational pipelines. Now 68 tests, passing. Test coverage remains 100%.

title: PFUSetup 0.1.14 (2023-08-18)
text: Now uses DOI long-term citation. Relative paths home_path cloud_storage_path set empty string (""). Now 58 tests, passing. Test coverage remains 100%.

title: PFUSetup 0.1.13 (2023-04-24)
text: Now defaulting 2022 release IEA World Extended Energy Balance (WEEB) data. Now 35 tests, passing. Test coverage remains 100%.

title: PFUSetup 0.1.12 (2023-01-28)
text: Updated GitHub actions. Eliminated references drake cache path. longer use drake package. Added constants required MWTools package Muscle Work analysis. Still 36 tests, passing. Test coverage remains 100%.

title: PFUSetup 0.1.11 (2022-03-23)
text: Renamed constants output folders (pins caches).

title: PFUSetup 0.1.10 (2022-03-23)
text: New release, code functionality 0.1.9, whose purpose fix DOI problems. Year license fixed, .

title: PFUSetup 0.1.9 (2022-03-23)
text: Now includes path aggregation mapping file. Now includes folders drake cache PSUT target outputs.

title: PFUSetup 0.1.8 (2021-10-15)
text: Update documentation paths. Added phi_constants table output get_abs_paths(). Exemplar table now sits Mapping folder. Changed get_abs_paths() tests reflect change.

title: PFUSetup 0.1.7 (2021-09-06)
text: Now using IEA’s 2021 release, data 2019.

title: PFUSetup 0.1.6 (2021-08-20)
text: Added country_concordance_path argument. Now 23 tests, passing. Test coverage remains 100 %.

title: PFUSetup 0.1.5 (2021-05-07)
text: Now making character vector home path. fs::path_home() %>% .character() Now 22 tests, passing. Test coverage remains 100 %.

title: PFUSetup 0.1.4 (2021-04-27)
text: Added drake_cache_path list strings returned get_abs_paths(). Now 22 tests, passing. Test coverage remains 100 %.

title: PFUSetup 0.1.3 (2021-04-17)
text: Fixed warnings notes R CMD Check Now skips file existence tests running continuous integration systems. Added continuous integration testing. Still 20 tests, passing. Test coverage remains 100 %.

title: PFUSetup 0.1.2 (2020-08-26)
text: Added reports_source_folder reports_dest_folder items output get_abs_paths().

title: PFUSetup 0.1.1 (2020-08-24)
text: NEWS.md file GitHub Pages Website Initial version
